src.apply_stemmer(sentence: str, stemmer_name=<PorterStemmer>) → str¶

This method applies stemmer to given sentence

Parameters

  • sentence – input string, :type str

  • stemmer_name – stemmer to apply: SnowballStemmer | PorterStemmer

Returns

src.basic_preprocess_operations(sentence: str) → str¶
This method applies basic preprocess operations to given sentence:

remove_hyperlink & replace_newline & to_lower & remove_number & remove_punctuation & remove_whitespace

Parameters

sentence – sentence to apply preprocess operation, :type str

Returns

src.pipeline(corpus, n_cluster: int, labels: list, max_df: int = 1, min_df: int = 1, max_features: int = None, analyzer: str = 'word', n_gram=(1, 1), n_components: int = 40, idf: bool = True)¶

This method applies tf-idf, svd and k-means clustering with given parameters

Parameters

  • n_gram –

  • analyzer –

  • labels – list of labels

  • idf – use idf

  • corpus – data to train

  • n_cluster – number of clusters

  • max_df –

  • min_df –

  • max_features –

  • n_components –

Returns
